altername_name: Marie & Elie no Atelier: Salburg no Renkinjutsushi 1 & 2
name: Atelier Marie + Elie: The Alchemists of Salburg 1・2
overview: Marie & Elie no Atelier: Salburg no Renkinjutsushi 1-2 (マリー＆エリーのアトリエ 〜ザールブルグの錬金術士１･２〜) is an compilation for the Sega Dreamcast, containing enhanced versions of Marie no Atelier: Salburg no Renkinjutsushi (1997) and Elie no Atelier: Salburg no Renkinjutsushi 2 (1998).
